verses.roman:
brahmāra durlabha tomāra śrī-caraṇa-reṇu
hena caraṇa-sparśa pāila mora adhama tanu

synonyms: brahmāra—by Lord Brahmā; durlabha—almost unattainable; tomāra—Your; śrī-caraṇa-reṇu—dust of the lotus feet; hena—such; caraṇa-sparśa—touch of the lotus feet; pāila—got; mora—my; adhama—most fallen; tanu—body.
translation: "The dust of Your lotus feet is not attainable even by Lord Brahmā, yet Your lotus feet have touched my wretched body.
